entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.5°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
